explanation: Agent A is correct. The code contains two occurrences of if (1) — a controlling expression that is a constant true, i.e. invariant. MISRA C 2023 Rule 14.3 forbids invariant controlling expressions except for the listed exceptions (infinite loops and the specific do-while constant-false case). The if (1) instances do not match those exceptions, so they violate Rule 14.3. The fix is to remove the if (1) and use a plain compound statement (braced block) or otherwise restructure the code or record an approved deviation.
